<Text: Military of ancient Egypt:  The civilization coalesced around 3150 BC with the political unification of Upper and Lower Egypt under the first pharaoh, and it developed over the next three millennia.>
Triplets:<Military of ancient Egypt

<Text: Military of ancient Egypt:  Its history occurred in a series of stable "kingdoms", separated by periods of relative instability known as "intermediate periods".>
Triplets:<Military of ancient Egypt
4:

Text: Military of ancient Egypt:  Egypt was conquered by a succession of foreign powers in this late period, and the rule of the pharaohs officially ended in 31 BC when the early Roman Empire conquered Egypt and made it a province.
